title: Sample, "Meda", 1993
medium:
Medium: viscose 53%, cotton 47%
Technique: printed on plain weave
markings:
Printed on edge, color register of 4 colors.
Printed on edge in white-on-white, 'DESIGN BEPPE KESSLER - DESIGN  MEDA  EXCLUSIV  WK-WOHNEN."
Printed paper label removed and put into research folder.
provenance: Taunus Textildruck Zimmer GmbH & Co. KG; 1993: acquired by Museum
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 121 x 147 cm (47 5/8 x 57 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Taunus Textildruck Zimmer GmbH & Co. KG
description: Impressionist color effect printed on small scale weave patterned fabric.  Overall pattern of splashes of color in golds, pinks and blues on white fabric.

participants.person_name: Taunus Textildruck Zimmer KG - do not use
